column3: Latest;Phnom Penh City Hall------ spokesman Meth Meas Pheakdey confirmed that work on troubled high-rise project Gold Tower 42
column4: along Monivong Boulevard and Sihanouk in Boeung Keng Kang I
column7: has been suspended.------The cessation of construction follows an ------incident on Wednesday ------where a car was badly damaged by material which fell from the top of the building.------Phnom Penh authority has temporarily stopped all work at the site to check the safety. ------TVFB
